name: A Penguin with Sunglasses
description:
NOTE: IT IS RECOMMENDED TO USE FULL-SCREEN WHEN PLAYING.

A Penguin with Sunglasses is a single-player, 2D platformer that was submitted for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. 

Our penguin with sunglasses is trying to return to his cold, Artic home. However, to do so, he must traverse through warm areas where the weather does not suit him well. If not cooled down, our penguin will slowly go insane and his movements will become sluggish. These heat waves hit the penguin at a semi-random rate and the side-effects can range anywhere from slipping on floors, lower jumps, and even moving involuntarily and rejecting all user inputs.
